column3: Please do translation updates via transifex (https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/bitcoin/). We pull changed translations from there before release.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/eb4139c5bec6c68ce49932104abf23f06195c88c for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
